creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: portrait of a woman with her hair in a ponytail, holding a strand of her hair in her mouth; woman turns head toward PR; woman wears garments with many patterns including blue outer kimono with grey arching geometric designs; snowy landscape behind woman, with snow-covered trees and dark sky
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Seal

Written in the  Toyokuni ga 豊國画 in toshidama cartouche
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Chūnagon Asatada's Poem and The Courtesan Urazato
